description: Resource which houses items or applications to be protected.

commands.name: az backup container list
commands.summary: List containers registered to a Recovery services vault.
commands.syntax:
az backup container list --backup-management-type {AzureIaasVM, AzureStorage, AzureWorkload, MAB}
                         --resource-group
                         --vault-name
                         [--use-secondary-region]
examples: az backup container list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --vault-name MyVault --backup-management-type AzureIaasVM

commands.name: az backup container re-register
commands.summary: Reset the registration details for a given container.
commands.syntax:
az backup container re-register --workload-type {MSSQL, SAPASE, SAPHANA, SAPHanaDatabase, SQLDataBase}
                                [--backup-management-type {AzureIaasVM, AzureStorage, AzureWorkload}]
                                [--container-name]
                                [--ids]
                                [--resource-group]
                                [--subscription]
                                [--vault-name]
                                [--yes]
examples: az backup container re-register --resource-group MyResourceGroup --vault-name MyVault --container-name MyContainer --workload-type MSSQL --backup-management-type AzureWorkload --yes

commands.name: az backup container register
commands.summary: Register a Resource to the given Recovery Services Vault.
commands.syntax:
az backup container register --resource-group
                             --resource-id
                             --vault-name
                             --workload-type {MSSQL, SAPASE, SAPHANA, SAPHanaDatabase, SQLDataBase}
                             [--backup-management-type {AzureIaasVM, AzureStorage, AzureWorkload}]
examples: az backup container register --resource-group MyResourceGroup --vault-name MyVault --resource-id MyResourceId --workload-type MSSQL --backup-management-type AzureWorkload

commands.name: az backup container show
commands.summary: Show details of a container registered to a Recovery services vault.
commands.syntax:
az backup container show [--backup-management-type {AzureIaasVM, AzureStorage, AzureWorkload, MAB}]
                         [--ids]
                         [--name]
                         [--resource-group]
                         [--subscription]
                         [--use-secondary-region]
                         [--vault-name]
examples: az backup container show --name MyContainer --resource-group MyResourceGroup --vault-name MyVault

commands.name: az backup container unregister
commands.summary: Unregister a Backup Container to make the underlying 'resource' be protected by another vault.
commands.syntax:
az backup container unregister [--backup-management-type {AzureIaasVM, AzureStorage, AzureWorkload, MAB}]
                               [--container-name]
                               [--ids]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--subscription]
                               [--vault-name]
                               [--yes]
examples: az backup container unregister --container-name MyContainer --resource-group MyResourceGroup --vault-name MyVault --backup-management-type AzureStorage
